properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
ARGENTINA.
DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V BGP PIONEER TOWING SEVEN MILE
   LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   36-49S 055-02W, 38-12S 052-06W,
   43-28S 056-12W, 43-25S 059-54W.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2010/17.
